m_szDocTitle: Breaking Into The Top 20 US Car Sales (Poll Results) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Breaking Into The Top 20 US Car Sales (Poll Results) August 19th, 2014 by Zachary Shahan   Answers are still trickling in, but I think it’s a good time to report on where things stand now. 11 days ago, I published a story on how Nissan LEAF sales compare with the sales of the top 20 cars in the US . I ended with a poll, asking you intelligent readers when you think an electric car (100% electric or plug-in hybrid/extended-range electric) will first break into the top 20 of US car sales. This is actually very similar to a poll I conducted in July/August 2013, so I was curious to see how they co
